name: Better Stone of Agony
author: Avaro
info: A replacement for ZC's stone of agony. This one can make link vibrate and/or play a sound effect and/or show an indicator above link's head. It can detect trigger flags and/or a script flag.
description: Check out the demo quest. It's unpassworded of course.
setup:
Set up the constants in the scriptfile to your liking! Then import the script.

The global active script is needed if you use vibrating. If you already have an active global script, you need to combine them (the horror! :O).

Place the FFC script on any screen where you want your stone of agony to detect something.

D0: How to detect secrets
0 = Detect trigger flags
1 = Detect the script flag
2 = Detect both trigger flags and the script flag

D1: Condition for detecting secrets
0 = Always detect
1 = Don't detect if permanent secrets are activated

It will detect flags on all layers!

Requires std.zh, which comes with ZC.
